meanings.definition: A metric unit of mass equal to 100 grams.
meanings.sent1: She measured the flour in hectograms for the recipe.
meanings.sent2: The package weighed exactly five hectograms.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally spilled a hectogram of sugar on the counter.
meanings.sent4: His love for cooking weighed more than a thousand hectograms.
meanings.sent5: The tiny bird weighed less than a single hectogram.
